title: [Large-Scale] Web Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Mathematics Lesson Design Using a Collaborative Learning Platform

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of intermediate-level mathematical concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively develop three or more mathematics education scenarios with team members on a collaboration platform.
Learners can store designed learning activities on a platform and achieve over 80% search efficiency.
Learners can perform two or more feedback iteration cycles using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
